Public F-Droid repo, use at own risk

This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are either official binaries built by the original application developers, or not.

Currently it serves 40 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://funstore.github.io/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
74 E8 A2 5C D9 92 FF 49 5E E4 F1 58 1F A7 D1 9E D3 6A A3 70 BD FA 4C 58 C5 56 DB AA 81 E5 B1 7D
